title: Ticket #852: Shadow and local starter may skip final job ad update to sched
description:
Both the shadow and the starter (for local universe) use the QmgrJobUpdater class to forward job ad updates to the schedd. QmgrJobUpdater contains an optimization that skips the final update to the schedd if there's no history file. The theory is that if the job ad is about to be removed from the queue and won't be saved anywhere, we can save some of the schedd's time.

This ignores a number of cases where the job ad doesn't disappear into the ether on completion or removal:

  • LeaveJobInQueue = True
  • Quill
  • PER_JOB_HISTORY_DIR

Rather than try to check for these cases and any future ones, QmgrJobUpdater should always do the final update.
